text:
<% if [all[current]tag[Project]] %>
Goal {{!!goal}}
Resources {{!!resources}}
Status <> <$list filter="[all[current]projectstatus[Done]]"> on <$view field="completed" format="date" template="mmm 0DD YYYY"/> <$list filter="[all[current]!projectstatus[Done]]"> issues: <$view field="issues"/>
<$details summary="Pending Tasks" class=big>
    <$list filter="[all[current]backlinks[]tag[Task]!taskstatus[Done]]">
  • <$link/> <% if [<>has[goal]] %> <$view <>field="goal"> <% endif %>
<% endif %>
title: $:/sf/Templates/Automatic/Project
creator: soren
description: Display a table of fields and other information about the project described by this tiddler.
